author: ABS-CBN News
title: Renewables can compete with coal in long term: Pure Energy
text:
Watch also in iWantv or TFC.tv 
MANILA – Clean power sources can compete with coal in the long term, as increasing capacity helps bring down costs, Pure Energy Holdings Corp president Gary Espino said Thursday. 
The hydroelectric and geothermal power producer hopes to help increase the share renewables in the country’s energy mix to 40 percent in the next 10 years. 
“Coal will only solve the short-term problem that we are faced with,” he said. – ANC, Market Edge with Cathy Yang, Feb. 23, 2017
